import React from "react"; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { addproduct } from "../actions"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router"; import swal from 'sweetalert'; function Admin_Add() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const history = useHistory() const onAdd = () => { let name = document.getElementById('name').value let description = document.getElementById('description').value let price = document.getElementById('price').value let rating = document.getElementById('rating').selected let imageURL = document.getElementById('imageURL').value let quantity = document.getElementById('quantity').value dispatch(addproduct(name,description,price,rating,imageURL,quantity)) swal("Add Success",'', "success"); history.push('/') } return (

Add Product

); } export default Admin_Add;
